confessions.content: Hey guys, your developer here (read gossip girl). This is your space so go crazy so let it all out whether it's a rant, a message to all emenents, a message to me, feedback, advice, questions or even something to motivate all the other user. Let's connect a little more and build our very own little community. If your confession doesn't show up right away that's because it needs to pass a few tests before it can be posted simply to make this a safe community for everyone. If you want a response on your message then drop your email and I'll get back to you. xoxo ur favrt person
